title: 12/07/21 DPS Hour 3 Kirk Herbstreit
itunes:title: 12/07/21 DPS Hour 3 Kirk Herbstreit
description:
Kirk Herbstreit talks to Dan about the Heisman watch. Kirk explains how Nick Saban just keeps on winning and doesn't get enough respect.
